name: Kaapvaal
startIntroPart1: In 2.7 billion years ago(GYA), The Kaapvaal Craton (Eastern south Africa) and Pilbara Craton (North-western western Australia) formed Vaalbara which is one of the earliest supercontinent. In Abyssal plains, mass amount of Cyanobacteria carry out photosynthesis, breaking down clouds of toxic methane into carbon dioxide and water, The earth will become colder and Habitable from now on with great oxidation
startIntroPart2: Vaalbara, the earliest supercontinent is still barren land, and the planet provides you chance to cause animal genesis with oxidation and tectonics. Will you develop this barren land into thriving paradise? Can you build a proto animal that stands the test of time?
declaringWar: The demon wants the blood of soldiers!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: Aw, messed up! Vaalbara has split.
introduction: Are you real or a phantom?
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing - to make this deal with me.

name: Pilbara
startIntroPart1: 2.1 billion years ago...the first cyanobacteria were born on Earth, which was full of water. It is the first oxygenic photosynthesis and the common ancestor of plants and algae. Cyanobacteria spread efficiently through photosynthesis, causing one of the most important oxidative events in Earth's history. also, when the cyanobacteria dies, Stromatolites are formed with cyanobacterial remains accumulate. This is the only structure made by life during the Boring Billion.
startIntroPart2: We, Cyanobacteria, can transform this barren earth into a planet that is habitable for life. By enveloping the Earth with stromatolites and purifying the atmosphere of this planet, we can advance our evolution quickly. Expand the Stromatolite all over the world!
declaringWar: The demon wants the blood of soldiers!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: It is over. Perhaps now I shall have peace, at last.
introduction: Are you real or a phantom?
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Science] from [Stone] tiles [in all cities]

declaringWar: The demon wants the blood of soldiers!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: It is over. Perhaps now I shall have peace, at last.
introduction: Are you real or a phantom?
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.
uniques: Comment [[Cell] Units can make [Snow] tile and [Ice] tile with consuming unit and 300 [Biomass]]

name: Burgess Shale
startIntroPart2: The Life and Death of Planet Earth, sometimes, massive destruction is come with climate change and Medea... can you led us to survive this era with our genome?
attacked: Well, you will see why we are called 'Wonderful Life'.
defeated: No matter what you do, Our biota will be preserved with fossils. Anyways, I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: Welcome to the honored dinocaridida kingdom.
neutralHello: Good day. The earth is full of vitality today.
hateHello: Unfortunately, The earth is full of blood today...
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
uniques: [+1 Science] from [Water] tiles [in all cities] <during the [Cambrian period]>

name: Wheeler Shale
uniques: [+1 Science] from [Algae] tiles [in all cities] <starting from the [Cambrian period]>

name: United States
startIntroPart1: America is the most great mammal nest in history. Although their history is extremely short from an evolutionary anthropological perspective, they are a h.sapiens society that has achieved tremendous growth from the European colonial era to the present. The U.S. army and FBI (professional defenders of their nest) always have the upper power even in organized battle between their homogenus, and are at the apex predator of present earth (it needs 100 polar bear to beat 1 American fighting man).
startIntroPart2: Apparently, this strange world will someday be Earth, and we, as a civilization of sapiens, need to led this world.
declaringWar: Your wanton aggression leaves us no choice. Prepare for war!
attacked: You have mistaken our love of peace for weakness. You shall regret this!
defeated: The day...is yours. I hope you will be merciful in your triumph.
introduction: The people of the United States of America welcome you.
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
uniques: [-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]

name: Sahelanthropus
startIntroPart1: Introducing Sahelanthropus, the Chimpanzee-Human Divergence(hypothetical). He was the first primate to walk bipedalism(but not perfect), and is morphologically closer to panina than hominina. (the use of stone tools is yet to come)
startIntroPart2: Orrorin, the primates evolved to be weakest creatures are eager to uncover the predominance of Intelligent and Creativity on this wildly planet ruled by the survive of strongs. Will you reach a new pinnacle of mammalians? Can you build a tribes that stands the test of time? Behold the rock weapon we created, It obvious describe how intelligent works for us!
declaringWar: Ooga BoogaOoga Booga!
attacked: Ooga Booga!
defeated: Ooga Booga.
uniques: Production to [Science] conversion in cities changed by [+10]%

uniques: [+1 Science] from [{Flesh water} {GrassLand}] tiles [in all cities]

declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.

name: Sirius Passet
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: May God grant me these last wishes - peace and prosperity for Halkieria.

name: Maotianshan
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, for war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.

name: Cryogenia
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Why do we fight? Because Inanna demands it. Now, witness the power of the Sumerians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?

name: Mazon Creek
declaringWar: In responding to the unstinting malignancy that has heretofore defined your relationship with Canada, we can have no recourse but war!
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.
